attributes.action: There is much talk about help for small businesses.  There is no help whatsover.  Banks are increasing their interest charges and reducing their overdrafts.  Funds from the Government simply are not in place or have they been side-swiped in our network of quangos?  Perhaps the Government could contact real small business owners/sole traders through Customs and Excise and reach real people, find out their problems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small businesses/sole traders are going under.  My business is down 80% this year.  I have no income.  When I try and get help from trade associations etc. you are met with the usual "Quango" syndrome.  The Banks are acting like stuck pigs.  I think there are many people in a situation like me  ... late 50's early 60's .... cannot afford to retire ..... not enough work ...... not a member of an ethnic society etc. etc.

rejection.details: We suggest you visit the Real Help Now website for more advice on the assistance that is available. http://realhelpnow.gov.uk/
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
